name: Infernoid Onuncu
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or GY) by banishing 3 "Infernoid" monsters from your hand or GY while the total Levels and Ranks of all Effect Monsters you control are 8 or lower. When this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy all other monsters on the field. Once per turn, when a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster; negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card.
